scripts.clean: test -d sass && rm -r sass ; test -f package.json && rm package.json ; test -f package-lock.json && rm package-lock.json
scripts.cleantest: test -d sass && echo "sass OK" ; test -f package.json && echo "package.json OK" ; test -f package-lock.json && echo "package-lock.json OK "
scripts.prod: git checkout prod && git merge -X theirs main && npm run clean && npm run commit && git push && git ftp push && git checkout main
